alert.note: Alert for Clay; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 7:49PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Talladega and southwestern Clay Counties through 830 PM CST... At 749 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilsonville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sylacauga, Childersburg, Wilsonville, Talladega Springs, Waldo, Fayetteville, Winterboro, Alpine, Sycamore, Lay Lake, Cleveland Crossroads, Sylacauga Municipal Airport, Overbrook, Cedar Creek, Gantts Quarry, Hollins, Varnons, Chandler Springs, Roselle and Mignon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for central and east central Alabama.
